projects.title: Tire Chains R Us
projects.copy: As the lead front-end developer for this project, I skillfully translated a provided design into a fully functional website.  I achieved this by utilizing a custom WordPress theme in conjunction with WooCommerce. By implementing the design into the development process, I ensured a visually appealing and user-friendly interface that seamlessly guides visitors through the product offerings.

projects.title: Task Manager
projects.copy: Presently underway, this project stands as an ongoing endeavor, meticulously constructed utilizing a stack comprising React, Typescript, Express, Node, and MongoDB. The core essence of this initiative resides in facilitating comprehensive task management across a spectrum of projects, concurrently fostering an environment conducive to seamless collaboration by affording the functionality to incorporate associates or collaborators. Notably, project ownership bestows the privilege to allocate distinct roles to users, thereby endowing them with varying levels of access and capabilities.

projects.title: ATV Tires
projects.copy: I served as the front-end developer for this work project involving the creation of a custom WordPress theme integrated with WooCommerce. Tasked with bringing the provided design to life, I implemented the design elements to craft a visually striking and functional website. By seamlessly combining the power of WooCommerce with the custom theme, I ensured a seamless and intuitive e-commerce experience for users.

projects.title: Huddle Site
projects.copy: This website materialized as a response to a compelling challenge presented within the context of a Udemy course. The initiative involved a comprehensive provision of assets, hand in hand with a meticulously curated design blueprint. The crux of this challenge lay in the faithful realization of the site in accordance with the precise specifications of the 'client', all within the constraints of a tightly delimited time frame.
